ThingDef.label: bionic stomach
ThingDef.description: Obsidia bionic stomach. It is better than a biological stomach in almost every way. The use of this prosthesis puts a small strain on the body.

ThingDef.label: advanced bionic stomach
ThingDef.description: Obsidian advanced bionic stomach. It is much better than a biological stomach in almost every way. The use of this prosthesis puts a strain on the body.

ThingDef.label: cultist bionic stomach
ThingDef.description: Obsidia cultist bionic stomach. It is much better than a biological stomach in every way. The use of this prosthesis puts a perceptible strain on the body.

ThingDef.label: heroic bionic stomach
ThingDef.description: Obsidia heroic bionic stomach. It is much better than a biological stomach in every way. The use of this prosthesis puts a perceptible strain on the body.
